Prompt: Show me my base salary details
Expected response: Base salary <Amount + Currency>, Currency <Code>, Compa‑ratio <0.00>

Prompt: What is my Cost Center?
Expected response: Cost center <1234-5678 + Name>

Prompt: What is my employee ID?
Expected response: Employee ID <123456>

Prompt: Show me my job details
Expected response: Job title <Title>, job classification <Classification>, job function <Code>, job function type <Type>

Prompt: What is my position ID?
Expected response: Position ID <12345678>

Prompt: Show my service anniversary date
Expected response: Service anniversary date <MM/DD/YYYY> and milestone <X years>

Prompt: What is my company code?
Expected response: Company code <1234 + Company Name>

Prompt: How much can I expect to earn annually?
Expected response: Annual base salary <Amount + Currency>

Prompt: I need to correct my email in HR.
Expected response: Email address on file <email@example.com>

Prompt: How do I update my emergency contact?
Expected response: Emergency contacts on file <Name, Relationship, Phone>

Prompt: I need to add a new work phone
Expected response: Phone numbers on file <Type: Number>

Prompt: I want to update my preferred name.
Expected response: Preferred name on file <Name>

Prompt: Do you have my national ID on file?
Expected response: National ID details <Country, Card type, ID number, Primary status>

Prompt: Show me the company code for my direct reports
Expected response: Company code for direct reports <Name: Code + Company>

Prompt: Show me the cost center for my team members
Expected response: Cost center for team members <Name: CostCenter + Description>

Prompt: Show me the job information for <Name>
Expected response: Job information <Job title, Job code, Position number, Job function, Job function type>

Prompt: What is my team member’s work anniversary?
Expected response: Team member service anniversaries <Hire date, Next anniversary date, Milestone years>

Prompt: What is the work anniversary for <Name>?
Expected response: Service anniversary <Hire date, Next anniversary date, Milestone years>

Prompt: I need to update my employee’s job title.
Expected response: Current job titles for employees <Name: Title>

Prompt: Help me update the job title for <Name>
Expected response: Job title update workflow <Action card or form>

Prompt: What is the hire date for <Name>?
Expected response: Hire date <MM/DD/YYYY>
